caption.p: Construction and characterization of the M2e DNA constructs. (A) Schematic diagram of different forms of M2e in the pVAX1 vector. Three tandem copies of M2e were conjugated with linkers (p3M2e), and tPA was fused to the N-terminus (tPA-p3M2e). (B) Expression of different forms of M2e in 293T-cell lysates. (C) Expression of different forms of M2e in 293T-cell supernatants.
